"use client" import { useState, useContext, useEffect } from "react" import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { AuthContext } from "../../context/AuthContext" const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: "", password: "", }) const { username, password } = formData const { login, isAuthenticated, error, clearErrors, user } = useContext(AuthContext) const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { if (isAuthenticated && user) { navigate("/dashboard") } // eslint-disable-next-line }, [isAuthenticated, user]) const onChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() login(username, password) } return (

) } export default Login
